ygData.subject: Re: Kitting and magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, my main character is a shaman so the potential for kiting is there, but I tend not to kite very much.  Reason being is I despise being trained and if you
ygData.messageBody:
Well, my main character is a shaman so the potential for kiting is there, but I
tend not to kite very much. Reason being is I despise being trained and if you
have a pissed of critter running after you, you might tank it onto someone else.
Also, kiting stuff is pretty dull. In the amount of time I kite something, a group
can usually bring down the same thing a few times. For example, I could kite a
deepwater caiman easy, but a group of 3 could kill at least 2 to my 1. In my eyes,
kiting just isn't worth it unless you're kitting for wealth over xp gain.

Klaine, 15th shaman
Thomarus, 5th enchanter

> I realy dont like kitting it is from my opinion a serious bug in a
> Artifical inteligence program! I see druids kitting all times around
> wizards waiting in najena for a Jboots all with idea to go kitte something
> and get exp fast! What you think about it?
>
> Silverion Dragonirder
>
> High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
> Fenin Ro
